One of the key components of Bootstrap is its carousel and slider functionality, which enables the creation of image sliders, carousels, and other interactive content. This documentation will guide you through the implementation of Bootstrap 5.3 carousels and sliders. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide step-by-step instructions on how to implement carousels and sliders using Bootstrap 5.3. The scope of this documentation includes the necessary requirements and pre-requisites, detailed instructions, code snippets, troubleshooting tips, best practices, and a summary of key points. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites Before proceeding with the implementation of Bootstrap 5.3 carousels and sliders, ensure that you have the following requirements and pre-requisites in place: - Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript - Bootstrap 5.3 framework installed - A text editor or integrated development environment (IDE) for editing code ### Step-by-Step Instructions Follow these step-by-step instructions to implement carousels and sliders using Bootstrap 5.3: 1.
